content: but don t overstuff so that holes show in the work row 20 *decrease single_crochet 1* repeat around 8 stitches add some light stuffing for the head and nose row 21 single_crochet 8 8 stitches row 22 in the back loops only single_crochet 8 8 stitches bind bind off and leave a small tail using your needle thread around the outside of the remaining 8 stitches and pull closed tie off and thread the tail back up through the body shape the middle of the nose will be sticking out at this point i find it best to give it a big push with your finger almost all the way back in and then tease it out with your needle until the nose sits flat with the back loops from row 22 using your needle poke it into the stuffing near the head use it to push a little bit of that stuffing down into the nose flip the ears over so that they curve down over the eyes nostrils optional sew two small slits in the nose for nostrils criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-pig-amigurumi criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-pig-amigurumi
